name: Bunk.Town (cer0zz)
description:
Welcome to Bunk. Town!

Bunk.Town is a free multiplayer open world survival action game. No download/account needed! Game progression is auto-saved to your browser. The goal is to survive in Bunkfort Town and to get in Bunkfort Bunker. You can play solo, with friends, or against friends (minecraft multiplayer style), earn and spend money, help the police and much more! Just don't catch the virus...

The game can also be played at https://bunk.town

Discord Link: https://discord.gg/9ufGw2x

GOAL: Survive and sneak into the infamous Bunkfort Bunker! 

CONTROLS: AWSD to move. Mouse Left Click to attack/use items. SPACE to dash. Q/E/Scroll to switch items. B to buy items. USE MOUSE to manage your items. Drag your mouse out of the inventory to drop the items you are holding.

HOW TO SAVE: The game autosaves your progress when you close the game! However, this save is only unique to your browser. If you would like to keep the same progress on different browsers, be sure to navigate to the Bunkfort Safes to save your items in a public safe, and retrieve it in the other browser!

Items and maps are in the screenshots. For the peeps who have seen this game before, I apologize for posting it twice! I didn't realize the game can be embedded directly into the page, so I recreated a page.
